trans-unit.source: What is in the Azure RemoteApp template images?
trans-unit.target: What is in the Azure RemoteApp template images?

trans-unit.source: Learn about the template images included with Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the template images included with Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: What is in the Azure RemoteApp template images?
trans-unit.target: What is in the Azure RemoteApp template images?

trans-unit.source: Your Azure RemoteApp subscription includes three template images:
trans-unit.target: Your Azure RemoteApp subscription includes three template images:

trans-unit.source: Your Azure RemoteApp subscription grants you access to the software in the images, with the exception of Office 365 ProPlus, which requires a separate subscription, and Office 2013, which cannot be used in production.
trans-unit.target: Your Azure RemoteApp subscription grants you access to the software in the images, with the exception of Office 365 ProPlus, which requires a separate subscription, and Office 2013, which cannot be used in production.

trans-unit.source: This means that you can share the programs or apps on the template images with your users.
trans-unit.target: This means that you can share the programs or apps on the template images with your users.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you create a collection that uses the Windows Server 2012 R2 image, you can publish System Center Endpoint Protection for users to access through RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you create a collection that uses the Windows Server 2012 R2 image, you can publish System Center Endpoint Protection for users to access through RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Check out the <link><linkText>RemoteApp licensing details</linkText><title></title></link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: Check out the <link><linkText>RemoteApp licensing details</linkText><title></title></link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: And <link><linkText>Using Office with Azure RemoteApp</linkText><title></title></link> for the Office licensing info.
trans-unit.target: And <link><linkText>Using Office with Azure RemoteApp</linkText><title></title></link> for the Office licensing info.

trans-unit.source: Read on for details on what each image contains.
trans-unit.target: Read on for details on what each image contains.

trans-unit.source: This image is based on Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter operating system and has the following roles and features installed to meet the requirements for Azure RemoteApp template images:
trans-unit.target: This image is based on Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter operating system and has the following roles and features installed to meet the requirements for Azure RemoteApp template images:

trans-unit.source: This image also has the following applications installed:
trans-unit.target: This image also has the following applications installed:

trans-unit.source: Office 365 is the most requested application, so we created a "custom" image for you to work with.
trans-unit.target: Office 365 is the most requested application, so we created a "custom" image for you to work with.

trans-unit.source: This image is an extension of the vanilla image and has the following components of Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus installed in addition to the components described in the Windows Server 2012 R2 image:
trans-unit.target: This image is an extension of the vanilla image and has the following components of Microsoft Office 365 ProPlus installed in addition to the components described in the Windows Server 2012 R2 image:

trans-unit.source: The image also includes Visio Pro and Project Pro.
trans-unit.target: The image also includes Visio Pro and Project Pro.

trans-unit.source: And the following applications, as well:
trans-unit.target: And the following applications, as well:

trans-unit.source: Full functionality of Office 365 ProPlus apps is available only for users who have an Office 365 ProPlus plan.
trans-unit.target: Full functionality of Office 365 ProPlus apps is available only for users who have an Office 365 ProPlus plan.

trans-unit.source: For more details on the Office 365 subscription plans see <link><linkText>Office 365 service plans</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more details on the Office 365 subscription plans see <link><linkText>Office 365 service plans</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Also check out the new article, <link><linkText>How to use your Office 365 subscription with Azure RemoteApp</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Also check out the new article, <link><linkText>How to use your Office 365 subscription with Azure RemoteApp</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Note that you need to license Office 365 ProPlus, Visio Pro, and Project Pro separately - they each have their own license.
trans-unit.target: Note that you need to license Office 365 ProPlus, Visio Pro, and Project Pro separately - they each have their own license.

trans-unit.source: During the free trial period, you can test the service with the Office 2013 image.
trans-unit.target: During the free trial period, you can test the service with the Office 2013 image.

trans-unit.source: This image is an extension of the vanilla image and has the following components of Microsoft Office 2013 Professional Plus installed in addition to the components described in the Windows Server 2012 R2 image:
trans-unit.target: This image is an extension of the vanilla image and has the following components of Microsoft Office 2013 Professional Plus installed in addition to the components described in the Windows Server 2012 R2 image:

trans-unit.source: Legal information: This image does not include a Microsoft Office license and cannot be used for production.
trans-unit.target: Legal information: This image does not include a Microsoft Office license and cannot be used for production.

trans-unit.source: The Office 2013 Professional Plus image is intended for trial use only.
trans-unit.target: The Office 2013 Professional Plus image is intended for trial use only.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use Office apps in Azure RemoteApp for production, you need to use the Office 365 ProPlus image.
trans-unit.target: If you want to use Office apps in Azure RemoteApp for production, you need to use the Office 365 ProPlus image.

trans-unit.source: For more details on licensing Office, see <link><linkText>Using Office 365 with Azure RemoteApp</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: For more details on licensing Office, see <link><linkText>Using Office 365 with Azure RemoteApp</linkText><title></title></link>
